front.title: Profile for DCP Congestion Control ID 0:Single-Window Congestion Control

abstract.t: This document contains the profile for Congestion ControlIdentifier 0, Single-Window Congestion Control, in theDatagram Control Protocol (DCP) [DCP]. DCP implements acongestion-controlled, unreliable flow of datagrams suitablefor use by applications such as streaming media. The Single-Window Congestion Control CCID is used by senders that promiseto send no data whatsoever, except possibly for a singleinitial window of data sent at the beginning of theconnection.
